title: Dating Games
description: Irresistible to matchmakers Rachel's boss has a nephew she thinks would be 'perfect' for her. Her best friend's fiance just 'happens' to have a brother. Complete strangers are getting in on the act. Young, beautiful, single - and happy to stay that way - Rachel Todd is the matchmaker's ultimate challenge. 'Crash' McKenna's family seems to think they're a dating service with only one client. Him. And what with Thanksgiving approaching, they'll be around to force, avid to practice their matchmaking skills on the last remaining unwed McKenna. Rachel comes up with a simple plan to solve their mutual problem. She and 'Crash' will date to avoid dating. He knows this plan isn't just simple, it's crazy! So why is he going along with it?
author: Leigh Michaels
